glossary.title: Glossary
glossary.subtitle: Learn what the terms on the platform mean
glossary.defMcap: Total value of all coins or shares in circulation. Calculated as price × circulating supply. Used to compare the relative size of assets.
glossary.def24h: Price change over the last 24 hours, expressed as a percentage. Green usually means up, red means down.
glossary.defVolume: Total value of trades (buy + sell) in the last 24 hours. Higher volume often means more interest and liquidity.
glossary.defPrice: Current market price for one unit of the asset (e.g. one token or one share).
glossary.defLiquidity: How easily an asset can be bought or sold without moving the price. Higher liquidity usually means tighter spreads and less slippage.
glossary.defFearGreed: A sentiment index (0–100) that measures whether the market is driven by fear (caution, selling) or greed (optimism, buying). Used as a contrarian or confirmation signal.
glossary.defAltSeason: A period when alternative coins (altcoins) tend to outperform Bitcoin. The index shows how much capital is flowing into BTC vs other crypto.
glossary.defDominance: The share of total crypto market cap held by one asset (e.g. BTC dominance). Helps gauge whether money is in "safe" assets or riskier alts.
glossary.defRiskOnOff: Whether investors are favoring riskier assets (stocks, crypto) or safer ones (bonds, cash). In stocks mode this reflects allocation to growth vs defensive.
glossary.defOnChain: Data and activity that happens on the blockchain: transactions, wallet movements, smart contract calls. "On-chain" metrics are taken directly from the chain.
glossary.defFunding: A periodic payment between long and short positions in perpetual futures. Positive funding means longs pay shorts; negative means shorts pay longs.
glossary.defLiquidations: When a leveraged position is forcibly closed because collateral falls below a threshold. Large liquidations can cause sharp price moves.
glossary.defWhaleFlows: Large transfers of assets by big holders (whales). Used to spot accumulation, distribution, or potential market-moving activity.
glossary.defCommandCenter: The central panel on the landing page with tabs for Analysis, News, Flows, Mindshare, and Calendar. It aggregates market context and narratives.
glossary.defWatchlist: Your saved list of tokens or stocks. Prices and stats update in real time so you can track what you care about.
glossary.defTopCoins: A list or table of major crypto assets (or stocks in stocks mode) with price, change, volume, and market cap. Click a row to open the chart.
glossary.defPredictionMarkets: Markets where you can trade on the outcome of events (e.g. elections, sports). Prices reflect the market's implied probability.
glossary.defNarrative: How a theme (e.g. AI tokens, memes) moves from early hype to maturity or exhaustion. The Mindshare tab shows where different narratives sit on that timeline.

ui.liveAiBrief: Live AI market intelligence · Auto-rotating insights
ui.btcDomDetail: BTC dominance at {{val}}% — capital rotating to safety. Alts likely to underperform. Focus on BTC or wait for dominance reversal.
ui.altSeasonDetail: BTC dominance at {{val}}% — capital flowing into alts. Historically favorable for mid/small cap rotations.
ui.balancedMarketDetail: BTC dominance at {{val}}% — equilibrium zone. No strong rotation signal. Both BTC and alts can perform.
ui.highFundingDetail: BTC funding at +{{rate}}% — longs pay heavily. Overleveraged long positions at risk. Short squeeze less likely, long squeeze elevated.
ui.negativeFundingDetail: BTC funding at {{rate}}% — shorts paying. Short squeeze risk elevated. Contrarian signal favors upside.
ui.neutralFundingDetail: BTC funding at {{rate}}% — balanced positioning. No extreme leverage signal. Market in equilibrium.
ui.tradingViewNotAvailable: TradingView not available for this token

brief.btcBreakingOut: BTC breaking out — bulls in control.
brief.btcUnderPressure: BTC under pressure — bears testing support.
brief.btcSteady: BTC steady — waiting for a catalyst.
brief.leadingUp: leading the charge to the upside.
brief.momentumReal: Momentum is real. This is a trend day.
brief.buyersStepping: Buyers stepping in. Watch for continuation.
brief.capitulationSignals: Capitulation signals forming. Watch for a bottom.
brief.weaknessAcrossBoard: Weakness across the board. Cash is a position.
brief.rangeBoundReveal: Range-bound. Let the market reveal direction.
brief.weekendReview: Markets closed. Use this time to review setups and plan your week.
brief.fridaySquaring: squaring positions ahead of the weekend.
brief.mondayInstitutional: Institutional order flow setting the weekly tone.
brief.momentumBuilding: Momentum building. Earnings and macro alignment driving flows.
brief.focusQuality: Focus on quality names and wait for stabilization.
brief.buyingVixSpikes: Historically, buying when VIX spikes above 30 has been rewarding.
brief.marketHumblesComplacent: Remember: the market humbles the complacent.
brief.marketGivingTime: The market is giving you time, not a signal.
brief.steadyGrindHigher: steady grind higher — consistent gains compound.
brief.bestTradeNoTrade: best trade is sometimes no trade at all.
brief.sectorRotationInPlay: Sector rotation in play. Follow the relative strength.
brief.thinWeekendLiquidity: Thin weekend liquidity. Don't chase moves.
brief.weekendMovesDeceptive: Weekend moves on thin liquidity can be deceptive.
brief.panicSellingExpensive: panic selling is the most expensive emotion.
brief.hardestToNavigate: Often the hardest market to navigate.
brief.sentimentNotCaughtUp: Sentiment hasn't caught up to price.
brief.rotationHappening: Rotation is happening. Follow the flow.
brief.othersAreFearful: When others are fearful — that's opportunity territory.
brief.everyonesAGenius: Everyone's a genius in euphoria — that's exactly when risk management matters most.
brief.bestTradesFromWaiting: The best trades come from waiting.
brief.tradingPlanOrEmotions: trading your plan or trading your emotions?
brief.fearPeaksRelief: Fear peaks historically followed by relief.
